Class GameController

public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
Class that encodes the methods to carry on the game

  • Method Details

    • placeStone

      public void placeStone​(Move m) throws OutOfBoardException, IllegalMoveException
      Validate a move and then perform a it
      Parameters:
      m - a Move object
      Throws:
      OutOfBoardException - if the move is out of board
      IllegalMoveException - if the move is not allowed by the rules

    • getCellStatus

      public Colors getCellStatus​(int x, int y) throws OutOfBoardException
      Return the color of a cell
      Parameters:
      x - coordinate
      y - coordinate
      Returns:
      the status of the cell in that position
      Throws:
      OutOfBoardException - if the coordinated are out of the board size

    • validateMove

      public boolean validateMove​(Move m) throws OutOfBoardException
      Control if a move respect the set of rules encoded by its validator
      Parameters:
      m - the Move object to be validated
      Returns:
      boolean that encode the validity
      Throws:
      OutOfBoardException - if the move is out of the board

    • getSide

      public int getSide()

    • winner

      public Colors winner()
      Returns:
      the Color of the winner in that turn, if none returns COLORS.EMPTY

    • performGameMove

      public void performGameMove​(Coordinates m) throws IllegalMoveException, OutOfBoardException
      Same as PlaceStone but updates the number of turns
      Parameters:
      m - Move Coordinates object
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the move is forbidden by the rules
      OutOfBoardException - if the coordinates are out of the board

    • currentTurnColor

      public Colors currentTurnColor()
      Returns:
      the color that is currently playing

    • stringBoard

      public java.lang.String stringBoard()
      Returns:
      the board in a String printable format
